description:
Versatile winter weather warmth for slower-paced snowy activites. The Tobo Softshell pants are made with wind-resistant thermal material with a fleecy interior that feels great against the skin. DWR finish sheds snow so you stay dry whether you're sledding at the park, out for a snowshoe or learning to skate ski.

  • Made of abrasion-resistant high-tenacity nylon 6 and polyester with spandex for stretch and easy movement
  • Tightly woven fabric is wind-resistant and brushed thermal interior keeps you cozy on cold days
  • DWR finish sheds light moisture
  • Silicone gripper elastic on waistband and cuffs hold pants in place
  • Articulated knees for unrestricted range of motion
name: MEC Tobo Soft Shell Pants - Women's
